attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britian is still a Christian country and there are many Christians who feel the building of a huge mosque in East London is an insult to our country and our religion. Please stop this madness before our country is dragged into a civil war.....the signs are already there.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
